title: Service Learning-Based Mathematics Education Design and Effectiveness Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A comprehensive exploration of methodologies and effects of applying service learning theory to mathematics education, targeting graduate-level mathematics majors and those interested in educational technology.

learning_goals: The four types of service-learning design frameworks (design/effects, theory/research, implementation, engineering education) can be applied to mathematics education
Complete a mathematical modeling project for solving community problems using VR simulation with over 80% completion rate
The effectiveness of service-learning-based mathematics education can be evaluated using quantitative (statistical analysis) and qualitative (case study) methods

resources: Simulation Content Template for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
